name: Less Is Snore
description:
During a hot summer night, John has the window open to sleep better. But numerous nasty mosquitoes want to disturb his sleep with their never-ending buzzing!

Grab the fly swatter and make sure that John can sleep through the night relaxed. But be careful - too much swatting will wake him up!

LESS IS SNORE is my entry in the third #BTPGameJam.

  • All graphical assets were drawn by hand and cleaned up in Affinity afterwards.
  • Both the title and ingame music were composed in Renoise.
  • All sound effects were performed by me.  :)
